customMethods.name: updateParams
updateParams

config.script:
# A VAV has been selected. Utilize the index (from the dropdown's value)
	# to get the tag path and name, and then update the params.
	
	index = self.props.value
	
	tag = self.props.options[index].path
	name = self.props.options[index].label
	
	self.view.params.currentParams.name = name
	self.view.params.currentParams.tag = tag

customMethods.name: updateParams

onChange.script:
# The tag selection has changed. Utilize the selectedPath to find
	# the option in the options list, get the label and the units from
	# the option, and then update the params.
	
	if origin != 'Binding':
		selectedPath = currentValue.value
		options = self.props.options
		
		for option in options:
			if option['value'] == selectedPath:
				label = option['label']
				units = option['units']
				
				self.view.params.currentParams.name = label
				self.view.params.currentParams.units = units

messageHandlers.script:
# When the color is changed via the 'change color' popup, a message
	# is sent to this handler and this script updates the color param.
	
	color = payload['color']
	
	self.view.params.currentParams.color = color
